summary: Configured Neovim for Typst editing with tinymist LSP, treesitter, typst-preview.nvim, and <leader>l keybindings (filetype-isolated, same as LaTeX). Created ftplugin with nvim-surround setup and ~60 SnipMate-format snippets.

artifacts.summary: typst-preview.nvim plugin configuration for live preview
Typst ftplugin with <leader>l keybindings and nvim-surround configuration
Comprehensive SnipMate-format snippets for Typst editing
Implementation summary with keybinding reference and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Configured Neovim for Typst editing with tinymist LSP, treesitter highlighting, typst-preview.nvim for live preview, and filetype-specific keybindings under <leader>l. Created comprehensive snippet library and nvim-surround bindings matching the existing LaTeX workflow.

next_steps: Restart Neovim, run :Lazy sync to install typst-preview.nvim, and test by opening a .typ file
